short_description: glass tailors is a glass & mirror store based in united kingdom.
long_description: specialist in bespoke glass. we also provide bespoke glass to suit your business purposes and complete the wow factor for your place of work. glass tailors provides consistent and perfect results. glass tailors offers an extensive product and service range for domestic and commercial properties throughout greater london and surrounding areas. we provide a complete architectural and structural glass consultancy service, supporting your project from initial design to finished installation. we work closely with architects, designers and builders to provide technical expertise and full support from concept through to precise survey, manufacture and installation, ensuring that each bespoke glass project meets all relevant criteria and standards. our bespoke architectural glass solutions are precisely made and installed to meet even the most complex design briefs.
generated_description: glass tailors, legally known as glass tailors ltd., is a company based in london, england, specializing in bespoke glass products. with over 20 years of experience in the glass industry, the company offers a wide range of custom-made glass solutions, including glass balustrades, shelving, splashbacks, table tops, wall art, mirrors, shower screens, and custom glass installations for both domestic and commercial properties. provides comprehensive architectural and structural glass consultancy services, ensuring that each project meets relevant criteria and standards. the company is committed to delivering high-quality, precision-engineered glass products and exceptional customer service.
generated_business_tags: glass wall | glass tabletops | glass & mirrors | glass balustrades | glass splashbacks | shower screen | glass shelving | architectural and structural glass consultancy
